description: Bird eyes view of Pyroscope clusters

targets.expr: sum by (tenant) (rate(pyroscope_distributor_received_decompressed_bytes_sum{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (tenant) (rate(pyroscope_distributor_received_decompressed_bytes_count{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[10m]) > 0

sum by (state) (pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="ingester"}) / count by (state)(pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="ingester"})

panels.description: Distributor Ring is used for rate limiting

targets.expr: sum by (state) (pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="distributor"}) / count by (state)(pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="distributor"})

panels.title: Distributor Ring Status

targets.expr:
sum by (status) (
label_replace(
  label_replace(
        rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", route=~".*ingest.*|.*pusher.*"}[$__rate_interval]),
  "status", "${1}xx", "status_code", "([0-9]).."),
"status", "${1}", "status_code", "([a-z]+)")
)

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*ingest.*|.*pusher.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*ingest.*|.*pusher.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*ingest.*|.*pusher.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

count by (container,version) (pyroscope_build_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) or count by (container,version) (cloud_backend_gateway_build_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (status) (
label_replace(
  label_replace(
        rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", route=~".*pyroscope_render.*|.*pyroscope_label.*|.*querierservice.*"}[$__rate_interval]),
  "status", "${1}xx", "status_code", "([0-9]).."),
"status", "${1}", "status_code", "([a-z]+)")
)

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*pyroscope_render.*|.*pyroscope_label.*|.*querierservice.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*pyroscope_render.*|.*pyroscope_label.*|.*querierservice.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{container=~"pyroscope|distributor|query-frontend", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*pyroscope_render.*|.*pyroscope_label.*|.*querierservice.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (container)( count_over_time({namespace=~"$namespace",cluster=~"$cluster"} != "stream context finished" != "fast-joining node failed" != "CAS attempt failed" != "memberlist TCPTransport" |= " panic " or "panic:" or " err=" or "level=error" [$__interval]))

{namespace=~"$namespace",cluster=~"$cluster"} != "stream context finished" != "fast-joining node failed" != "CAS attempt failed" != "memberlist TCPTransport" |= " panic " or "panic:" or " err=" or "level=error"
{namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster", container="cortex-gw"} |= `msg="request timings"` | logfmt

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*ingester.*", workload_type="statefulset"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*ingester.*", workload_type="statefulset"}) by (pod))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/ingester", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*push.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/ingester", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*push.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/ingester", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*push.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (status) (
label_replace(
  label_replace(
        rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$namespace/ingester", route=~".*push.*"}[$__rate_interval]),
  "status", "${1}xx", "status_code", "([0-9]).."),
"status", "${1}", "status_code", "([a-z]+)")
)
sum by (tenant) (count_over_time({cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"} |= "upload new block" | logfmt [$__interval]))
sum by (tenant) (count_over_time({cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"} |= "cut row group segment" | logfmt [$__interval]))
sum by (tenant) (sum_over_time({cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"} |= "cut row group segment" | logfmt | unwrap numProfiles [$__interval]))
topk(10,sum by (tenant, reason) (rate(pyroscope_discarded_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])))
topk(10, sum by (tenant, reason) (sum_over_time(increase(pyroscope_discarded_samples_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])[$__range:1m])))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*distributor.*", workload_type="deployment"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*distributor.*", workload_type="deployment"}) by (pod))
sum by (type) (rate(pyroscope_distributor_received_compressed_bytes_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (type) (rate(pyroscope_distributor_received_samples_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (type) (rate(pyroscope_distributor_received_decompressed_bytes_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (type) (rate(pyroscope_distributor_received_samples_bytes_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (type) (rate(pyroscope_distributor_received_symbols_bytes_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/query-frontend", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*render.*|.*querier.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/query-frontend", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*render.*|.*querier.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/query-frontend", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*render.*|.*querier.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (status,route) (
label_replace(
  label_replace(
        rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$namespace/query-frontend", route=~".*render.*|.*querier.*"}[$__rate_interval]),
  "status", "${1}xx", "status_code", "([0-9]).."),
"status", "${1}", "status_code", "([a-z]+)")
)

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*query-frontend.*", workload_type="deployment"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*query-frontend.*", workload_type="deployment"}) by (pod))
{namespace=~"$namespace",cluster=~"$cluster",container="query-frontend"} |= "http.go" |~ "QuerierService|pyroscope|render" | logfmt | line_format "tenant={{.orgID}} traceID={{.traceID}} {{.msg}}"

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*querier.*", workload_type="deployment"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*querier.*", workload_type="deployment"}) by (pod))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/store-gateway", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*store.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/store-gateway", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*store.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (route) ( rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds{job=~"$namespace/store-gateway", cluster=~"$cluster",route=~".*store.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (status,route) (
label_replace(
  label_replace(
        rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$namespace/store-gateway", route=~".*store.*"}[$__rate_interval]),
  "status", "${1}xx", "status_code", "([0-9]).."),
"status", "${1}", "status_code", "([a-z]+)")
)

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*store-gateway.*", workload_type="statefulset"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job=~"(.*/)?cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".*store-gateway.*", workload_type="statefulset"}) by (pod))
sum by(operation)  (rate(objstore_bucket_operations_total{namespace=~"$namespace",cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace",cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le,operation))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, route) (rate(pyroscope_vcs_github_request_duration_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="querier"} [$__rate_interval])))
sum by (le, route, status_code) (rate(pyroscope_vcs_github_request_duration_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="querier"} [$__rate_interval]))

title: Pyroscope / Operational
